text: I dogu dau adu gi di ngudu di abaaba dela e haga ingoo bolo di Bontai Benjamin, gei au ga heetugi gi tangada aamua o digau hagaloohi i di ngudu di ala deelaa, dono ingoo go Irijah di tama ni Shelemiah, dono damana madua go Hananiah. Tangada hagaloohi deelaa ga haga duu au, ga helekai mai, “Goe deenaa le e hana e hagamaamaa digau o Babylonia!”
